Room.Name: East Tower Stairway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the eastern tower stairwell which winds around the large tower.
Room.LongDescription: A wonderful fragrance comes from the top of the stairs, but there is also a smell of decay as well. The stairs have not been used in a very long time. Seems as though every time you take a step on the stairs it doesn't seem as though you have gotten any closer to your goal.
